subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3614, how did it go?
description_text:
I still haven't received the item. Please help.

Em qua., 31 de dez. de 2025 12:45, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escreveu:

> Hello Mônica, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.

conversations.body_text: Hi Davizinhobeltrao,    We sincerely apologize for not addressing your message promptly. We will investigate and resend it as soon as possible! We deeply regret the inconvenience caused.
